Generation VIII.Sword: In ancient times, it was unbeatable thanks to its powerful lower body, but it went extinct anyway after it depleted all its plant-based food sources.
Generation VIII.Shield: The powerful muscles in its tail generate its electricity. Compared to its lower body, its upper half is entirely too small.

Generation VIII.Sword: Revive from Fossilized Bird and Fossilized Drake by Cara Liss on Route 6
Generation VIII.Shield: Revive from Fossilized Bird and Fossilized Drake by Cara Liss on Route 6
